document_notes.text:
This update for nodejs10 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-25881: Fixed regular expression denial of service vulnerability (bsc#1208744).

notes.text: This affects versions of the package http-cache-semantics before 4.1.1. The issue can be exploited via malicious request header values sent to a server, when that server reads the cache policy from the request using this library.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
